Class HCatCreateTableDesc

public class HCatCreateTableDesc
extends Object

      • create

        public static HCatCreateTableDesc.Builder create(HCatTable table,
                                                 boolean ifNotExists)
        Getter for HCatCreateTableDesc.Builder instance.
        Parameters:
        table - Spec for HCatTable to be created.
        ifNotExists - Only create the table if it doesn't already exist.
        Returns:
        Builder instance.

      • create

        public static HCatCreateTableDesc.Builder create(HCatTable table)
        Getter for HCatCreateTableDesc.Builder instance. By default, ifNotExists is false. So the attempt to create the table is made even if the table already exists.
        Parameters:
        table - Spec for HCatTable to be created.
        Returns:
        Builder instance.
